wow, cant wait to hear that, has anything happened since you asked the man =
to leave, any problems with the recorder?



______________________________=
__
From: April Abercrombie <april@...>
To: EVP-ITC=
@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Thursday, 25 June, 2009 14:33:22
Subject: Re: [EVP-I=
TC] sometimes they get you while your coming AND going :)





Bummer!

---=
-- Original Message ----- 
>From: James W. Hyslope 
>To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroup=
s .com 
>Sent: Wednesday, June 24, 2009 8:46 PM
>Subject: [EVP-ITC] sometim=
es they get you while your coming AND going :)
>
>
>I went out to record to=
day out in country. Was about 3 miles out-have recorded here before (Vandel=
ia). This time my recorder was acting up (DR60). The REC led indicator woul=
d flash sometimes (supposed to remain steady) and I would notice that the t=
imer would stay in place for sometimes 5 seconds before it would change up =
one number....I though I had broken it somehow. I did hear lots of LOUD spl=
atter noises on playback while in the field. My battery indicator showed 2 =
of 3 bars, but I went in to town and got fresh AAA's anyway. I then went to=
 water trough and the flashing still happened for 2 recordings here. I then=
 said for the "bad guy" to leave and stop messing with my recorder. Well th=
en on my 3rd attempt....recorder started working fine. After I finished the=
 3rd recording I packed up and went to the fairgrounds (just a spur of the =
moment) *I thought..... so at fairgrounds I recorded for a little over 10 m=
inutes (I stopped at an old -church/school/
 courthouse- (single room log c=
abin-multiple uses back then) that was used in Debuke Iowa during 1823 (thi=
nk was date). And I also asked questions around 2 other reconstructed build=
ings from long ago. Well I got home....when my recorder was acting up in co=
untry I find a Male evp say "Get Out Of My Face". I think he was guy messin=
g with my recorder.... ....Then while at the water trough (recorder still a=
cting up even with 2 new batteries) I finally get it to work (after telling=
 what I think followed me "to leave"). At the end of my last recording (the=
 good one) from this water trough, I hear a little girl say "come to the fa=
ir....someone said" ***So I didn't go to the fairgrounds uninvited*** I jus=
t decided to go for know reason I had guessed. Well what I am so "disturbed=
" about now......... is that while I was playing these other recordings I A=
CCIDENTALLY- ERASED my 10 plus minutes of recording from fairgrounds BEFORE=
 I even got a chance to listen or
 download it. OOOoooowwww! !! :) Makes me=
 mad. No telling what could have been on there. I was INVITED>>>>shucks! ! =
I will upload the "get out of my face" as the little girl is way to quite t=
o hear. The guy is not so quite-but is still LOW audio. I don't want him pl=
aying with my recorder anymore :/
>
>

<P>I went out to record today out in country. Was about 3 miles out-hav=
e recorded here before (Vandelia). This time my recorder was acting up (DR6=
0). The REC led indicator would flash sometimes (supposed to remain steady)=
 and I would notice that the timer would stay in place for sometimes 5 seco=
nds before it would change up one number....I though I had broken it someho=
w. I did hear lots of LOUD splatter noises on playback while in the field. =
My battery indicator showed 2 of 3 bars, but I went in to town and got fres=
h AAA's anyway. I then went to water trough and the flashing still happened=
 for 2 recordings here. I then said for the "bad guy" to leave and stop mes=
sing with my recorder. Well then on my 3rd attempt....recorder started work=
ing fine. After I finished the 3rd recording I packed up and went to the fa=
irgrounds (just a spur of the moment) *I thought..... so at fairgrounds I r=
ecorded for a little over 10 minutes (I stopped at an old
 -church/school/ =
courthouse- (single room log cabin-multiple uses back then) that was used i=
n Debuke Iowa during 1823 (think was date). And I also asked questions arou=
nd 2 other reconstructed buildings from long ago. Well I got home....when m=
y recorder was acting up in country I find a Male evp say "Get Out Of My Fa=
ce". I think he was guy messing with my recorder.... ....Then while at the =
water trough (recorder still acting up even with 2 new batteries) I finally=
 get it to work (after telling what I think followed me "to leave"). At the=
 end of my last recording (the good one) from this water trough, I hear a l=
ittle girl say "come to the fair....someone said" ***So I didn't go to the =
fairgrounds uninvited*** I just decided to go for know reason I had guessed=
. Well what I am so "disturbed" about now......... is that while I was play=
ing these other recordings I ACCIDENTALLY- ERASED my 10 plus minutes of rec=
ording from fairgrounds BEFORE I even got a chance
 to listen or download i=
t. OOOoooowwww! !! :) Makes me mad. No telling what could have been on ther=
e. I was INVITED>>>>shucks! ! I will upload the "get out of my =
face" as the little girl is way to quite to hear. The guy is not so quite-b=
ut is still LOW audio. I don't want him playing with my recorder anymore :/=
